  • Мобилни приложения

    With the "explosion" in the mobile devices usage, we decided to ride our part of the wave, specializing in building Android, iOS and Windows Phone native and hybrid apps. These apps quite often require more than just the pretty native user interface, but could also involve on-premise SQL Server or Azure SQL Database, Blob storage and push notification systems integration.

  • Уеб

    Our skills in ASP.NET/MVC, HTML5 and JavaScript help us create compelling web systems with responsive design. The concepts we follow and the architectures we create are in the foundation of making it possible to meet the scale and global reach of any demand.

  • Облачни услуги
